name: V_EHI_PAX_PB_ACCT_TX_GRP_TTL
description: This view filters out premium billing transaction data that is not appropriate for member level EHI exports when group billing is used.

columns.name: TRANSACTION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the account transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EMP_GRP_PAX_GRP_ID
columns.description: Specifies the employer groups for premium billing acount transactions group total.

columns.name: EMP_GRP_PAX_GRP_ID_PLAN_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer group record

columns.name: REM_PAX_GRP_TTL_AMT
columns.description: Specifies the remaining premium billing account transactions group total amount.
